title: Teacher Professional Development Program for Enhancing Formative Assessment (AfL) Competencies Based on the 4C/ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of science curricula and understanding of general educational principles
context.additional_context: Recreating authentic classroom environments via VR simulation and supporting mobile-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can apply the core principles of Assessment for Learning (AfL)—evidence collection, analysis, interpretation, and classroom application—to three or more science lesson cases.
Learners can design AfL-integrated lessons using the four components of the 4C/ID model: learning tasks, supportive information, procedural information, and part-task practice.
Learners can derive student learning progress diagnostics and feedback strategies with 80% accuracy based on assessment data generated in VR simulation environments.

resources: Science Curriculum AfL (Assessment for Learning) Case Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
